Can you provide an Excel table that outlines three benefits of the Internet of Things (IoT) in different industries?
Please include the following columns: 
- Industry 
- Benefit 
- Example 
Feel free to use online resources to gather information and provide reliable sources for each benefit.

Certainly! Here is an Excel table outlining three benefits of the Internet of Things (IoT) in different industries:

| Industry       | Benefit                               | Example                                                                                 |
|----------------|---------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Healthcare     | Remote Patient Monitoring             | IoT devices like wearables monitor vital signs and send data to healthcare providers, allowing for early detection and management of health conditions. [Source](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC8044960/) |
| Agriculture    | Precision Farming                     | IoT sensors provide real-time data on soil moisture and crop health, optimizing irrigation and improving yield. [Source](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0308521X20305907) |
| Manufacturing  | Predictive Maintenance                | IoT sensors monitor machinery performance, predicting failures and reducing downtime. [Source](https://www.inderscience.com/info/inarticle.php?artid=113453) |

This table provides a concise overview of how IoT is beneficial across different sectors, along with examples and sources for further reading.
